heading: Posting of certificates of occupancy
text:
The owner shall post a copy of the buildingâ€™s certificate of occupancy in
accordance with this section 28-118.19, except buildings occupied entirely by group R3. Buildings that are not required to have a
certificate of occupancy shall be posted by the owner with a sign or placard in a form prescribed by the commissioner. The certificate
of occupancy or sign, as applicable, shall be permanently affixed to the structure in a conspicuous loca tion in a public hall, corridor,
management office of the building or as otherwise prescribed by the commissioner.
